name: game-event-calendar
description: Game Event Calendar - YouTube RSS/HTML Crawling Based Event Extraction

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install -w backend && npm install -w frontend
scripts.dev: npm run dev -w backend & npm run dev -w frontend
scripts.build: npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w backend && npm run typecheck -w frontend
